name: Full Moon in Cloud Recesses
description:
A playable visual novel.
Jiang Cheng arrives to Cloud Recesses to study. He is immediately impressed by Second Young Master Lan. Wei Wuxian purposes a bet: would Jiang Cheng be able to kiss his potential sweetheart before the full moon?

FEATURES

- Animated backgrounds

- Meaningful choices

- Only original art

- Two different UIs

- 5 playable days

- 3 (4) different endings: Hopeful, Good and The Best. The latter comes in two flavours: The Best and The Very Best depending on relationship score

- Supporting cast consisting of JYL, WWX, NHS and LXC
